reviewHighlights.text: As of this writing, this game has been out for over 5 years and is now in it's 4th version. I love the whole crafting/survival genre, but to be blunt,...
This is about as basic as it gets for a Survival Crafting game. Char. Customization is pretty decent, and models are okay. Crafting is slow, tedious,...
